data.text: @ShessyLi Absolutely. But I just hope he gets savvy and lets the Court sort it out. He must make no more side deals with her cos that is where she screws him over all the time. For the sake of the kids he needs to toughen up with her. She has put them all thru unnecessary trauma.
@ALETTAHA She's just mad because the last judge told her to straighten up and let him see his kids or you lose custody!
@ALETTAHA Boooring. More like he regrets marrying such a control freak. Never could figure out what he could see in her. No accounting for taste I suppose.
@ALETTAHA Jup at heart of it is hatred willing to sacrifice peoples future to keep themselves happy
@Foxyjones2 For 2 years this woman kept his kids from him and poisoned them against their Father cos he lost interest in her. Nasty. She is poison. But #ancEff still beats her for nasty.😊
@ALETTAHA She sounds like the anc&eff cause they unhappy everybody must be unhappy perhaps she entered the vows thinking this is a socialist wedding?
